    PFUDatabase Demo Building Aggregation Maps From Row and Column Labels Following a Product Through an Energy Conversion Chain
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    All functions

    add_iea_mw_psut()
    Sum IEA and muscle work ECC matrices
    aggcountries_mw_to_iea()
    Aggregate ILO and FAO country data into IEA country groupings
    all_countries
    All countries and selected country groups
    alloc_graph()
    Generate an allocation graph
    alloc_plots_df()
    Create allocation graphs in a data frame
    assemble_eta_fu_tables()
    Assemble completed final-to-useful efficiency tables
    assemble_fu_allocation_tables()
    Assemble completed final-to-useful allocation tables
    assemble_phi_u_tables()
    Assemble completed phi (exergy-to-energy ratio) tables
    build_psut_dataframe()
    Build the final PSUT data frame
    calc_C_mats()
    Add allocation matrices to a data frame
    calc_C_mats_agg()
    Calculates the aggregated C matrices
    calc_Ef_to_Eloss_exiobase()
    Calculates the final energy to energy losses multipliers
    calc_Ef_to_Eu_exiobase()
    Calculates the final energy to useful energy multipliers
    calc_Ef_to_Xf_exiobase()
    Calculates the final energy to final exergy multipliers
    calc_Ef_to_Xloss_exiobase()
    Calculates the final energy to exergy losses multipliers
    calc_Ef_to_Xu_exiobase()
    Calculates the final energy to useful exergy multipliers
    calc_eta_fu_eff_phi_Y_EIOU_agg()
    Calculates the average FU energy efficiency times phi value
    calc_eta_fu_phi_u_vecs()
    Add efficiency (eta) and exergy-to-energy ratio (phi) vectors to a data frame.
    calc_fu_Y_EIOU_agg_efficiencies()
    Calculates the aggregated FU efficiency of products when used in EIOU, Y, or economy-wide
    calc_fu_Y_EIOU_efficiencies()
    Calculate final-to-useful efficiencies
    calc_phi_pf_vecs()
    Create a data frame of phi_pf vectors
    calc_phi_vecs_mw()
    Create a data frame of phi vectors for muscle work
    canonical_countries
    Canonical countries
    combine_countries_exemplars()
    Combine countries and additional exemplars
    double_counted_countries
    Double-counted countries
    eta_fu_graph()
    Generate an eta_fu graph
    eta_fu_plots_df()
    Create eta_fu graphs in a data frame
    exemplar_lists()
    Create exemplar lists from an exemplar table
    exemplar_names
    Exemplar table names
    expand_phi_vecs()
    Prepare phi vectors for writing as a data frame
    filter_mw_to_iea_years()
    Filter muscle work data to only those years contained in IEA data
    get_L_K_GDP_data()
    Create a dataframe containing capital (K), labor (L), and GDP data
    get_all_pwt_data()
    Get all pwt10 data for a set of countries
    get_eta_filepaths()
    Get all file paths to machine efficiency files
    get_fd_sectors()
    Retrieve a list of final demand sectors
    get_p_industry_prefixes()
    Retrieve primary industry prefixes
    get_pipeline()
    Create an analysis pipeline
    ieamw_cols
    Constants for data frames containing IEA and MW data frames
    is_balanced()
    Tells whether IEA data are balanced
    load_amw_pfu_data()
    Load animal muscle work data
    load_country_concordance_table()
    Load a country concordance table
    load_exemplar_table()
    Read an exemplar table from an Excel file
    load_fu_allocation_tables()
    Load FU allocation tables
    load_hmw_pfu_data()
    Load human muscle work data
    machine_constants
    Information about the machine efficiency files
    make_balanced()
    Balance IEA data
    make_iea_psut()
    Convert to PSUT matrices
    make_mw_psut()
    Calculate PSUT data frames from muscle work PFU data frames
    move_to_exergy()
    Move from all exergy quantities to all energy quantities in energy conversion chains
    move_to_useful()
    Move the last stage of the energy conversion chain from final stage to useful stage
    nonstat_alloc_graph()
    Generate an allocation graph which contains non-stationary allocations data only
    nonstat_alloc_plots_df()
    Create non-stationary allocation graphs in a data frame
    phi_sources
    Sources for phi values
    phi_u_graph()
    Generate an phi_u graph
    phi_u_plots_df()
    Create phi_u graphs in a data frame
    read_all_eta_files()
    Create a data frame containing machine Eta.fu and Phi.u values.
    read_list_exiobase_energy_flows()
    Reads the list of Exiobase energy flows
    remove_non_energy_use()
    Remove Non-energy use from energy conversion chains
    rename_mw_sectors()
    Rename muscle work sectors to comport with IEA sectors.
    sample_exemplar_table_path()
    Gives a file path to a sample exemplar table
    sep_eta_fu_phi_u()
    Choose eta.fu or phi.u columns from a data frame of eta.fu and phi.u vectors.
    socioecon_cols
    Constants for socioeconomic data files
    specify()
    Specify the IEA data
    sum_phi_vecs()
    Sums phi_pf and phi_u vectors
    target_names
    Targets cache target names
    verify_mw_energy_balance()
    Verify energy balance in muscle work PSUT matrices

    Developed by Matthew Heun, Emmanuel Aramendia, Zeke Marshall.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
